example.eg: Her shadow lengthened as the afternoon drew on.
example.egtrans: 随着下午临近，她的影子越来越长。

example.eg: A shadow haunts the graveyard.
He is just a shadow of his old self.
example.egtrans: 现在的他不过是过去自我的残余。

example.eg: He hid in the shadows.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 阴影处，阴暗处，背光处, 暗部，阴影区

example.eg: The shadow trade minister denounced the new ruling.
example.egtrans: 影子内阁贸易部长对新的裁定发出了谴责。

example.eg: My grandma claimed to see shadows of the future.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 预兆, 迹象, 兆头

example.eg: The nurse was the doctor's shadow.
Trees shadowed the yard.
Her hair shadowed her face.
The detective shadowed the suspect.
Ken shadowed the chef for two years before working on his own.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 当…的学徒, 当…的实习生

example.eg: Interns shadow different employees to learn their jobs.

dsense.name: beyond doubt, beyond a doubt, beyond the shadow of a doubt, beyond a shadow of a doubt

example.eg: This is beyond doubt the best song on the CD.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 毋庸置疑, 无可置疑

dsense.name: beyond doubt, beyond a doubt, beyond the shadow of a doubt, beyond a shadow of a doubt

example.eg: The theory of evolution is scientifically beyond doubt.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无疑的, 确信的, 无可怀疑的

example.eg: Mark's death has cast a shadow over the whole event.
She was wearing far too much eye shadow.  My wife always takes forever to put on her eye shadow!
My beard grows so quickly that I always have a five o'clock shadow by lunchtime.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 清晨才刮过傍晚就已长出的短胡须

example.eg: Following his long illness he is a mere shadow of his former self.
There's not the shadow of a doubt that he's guilty of the murder.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一点点疑问, 一丁点怀疑
独自练拳, 与假想敌进行拳击训练

dsense.name: shadowbox (US), shadow-box (UK)
dsense.guideword: figurative (pretend to deal with a problem)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 展示灯箱, 展示镜框, 展示玻璃橱窗

dsense.name: without a doubt, without doubt, without the shadow of a doubt

example.eg: Without a doubt, this is the best chocolate cake I've ever tasted.
